files.name: .gitignore
files.content:
# Binaries for programs and plugins
*.exe
*.exe~
*.dll
*.so
*.dylib

# Test binary, build with `go test -c`
*.test

# Output of the go coverage tool, specifically when used with LiteIDE
*.in
*.out

/.idea
/vendor
/[0-9]*
/todo
/zdash
/main.go
/main_test.go
/drop.go
/helper.go
/main/main.go
/main/main_test.go
/leetcode/main_todo.go
*.txt
*.bat
*.md
*.jpg
